Title: Requires the municipal police training council to promulgate rules and regulations regarding psychological evaluations for certain members of a police force
Summary: Requires the municipal police training council to promulgate rules and regulations regarding psychological evaluations for certain members of the police force of a city with a population of one million or more.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to requiring the municipal police training council to promulgate regulations regarding psychological evaluations
